name: Ito Ito no Mi
description: The Ito Ito no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create and manipulate strings, which can be used for a variety of purposes including controlling others like puppets.
weaknesses: Strings can be cut by strong enough forces
awakening: Allows the user to turn the environment into strings
history: This fruit is currently used by Donquixote Doflamingo, a former Warlord of the Sea.
